name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

description.0: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

0.0: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an <cryo>8%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

1.0: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a <cryo>10%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

2.0: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain a <cryo>12%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

3.0: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain a <cryo>14%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

4.0: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain a <cryo>16%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
